author: Pradeep Thakur
description: NEW DELHI: The NDA government's first Cabinet decision, taken on May 27, 2014, saw PM Narendra Modi setting up a special investigation team (SIT), headed by a retired SC judge, to oversee a coordinated crackdown on black money, an intent that has marked several administrative and legislative actions since then.
title: PM sends clear message with black cash crackdown - Times of India
